runes.name: Electrocute
runes.shortDesc: Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities in 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.
runes.longDesc:
Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities within 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.

Damage: 30 - 220 (+0.1 bonus AD, +0.05 AP) damage.

Cooldown: 25 - 20s

'We called them the Thunderlords, for to speak of their lightning was to invite disaster.'

runes.name: Dark Harvest
runes.shortDesc: Damaging a low health champion inflicts <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and harvests a soul from the victim.
runes.longDesc:
Damaging a Champion below 50% health deals adaptive damage and harvests their soul, permanently increasing Dark Harvest's damage by 5.

Dark Harvest damage: 20-80 (based on level) (+5 damage per soul) (+0.1 bonus AD) (+0.05 AP)
Cooldown: 45s (resets to 1.5s on takedown)

runes.name: Hail of Blades
runes.shortDesc: Gain a large amount of Attack Speed for the first 3 attacks made against enemy champions.
runes.longDesc:
Gain 110% (80% for ranged champions) Attack Speed when you attack an enemy champion for up to 3 attacks.

No more than 3s can elapse between attacks or this effect will end.

Cooldown: 12s.

Attack resets increase the attack limit by 1.
Allows you to temporarily exceed the attack speed limit.

runes.name: Cheap Shot
runes.shortDesc: Deal bonus true damage to enemy champions with <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairAct'>impaired movement or actions</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
runes.longDesc:
Damaging champions with impaired movement or actions deals 10 - 45 bonus true damage (based on level).

Cooldown: 4s
Activates on damage occurring after the impairment.

runes.name: Taste of Blood
runes.shortDesc: Heal when you damage an enemy champion.
runes.longDesc:
Heal when you damage an enemy champion.

Healing: 16-40 (+0.1 bonus AD, +0.05 AP) health (based on level)

Cooldown: 20s

runes.name: Sudden Impact
runes.shortDesc: Damaging basic attacks and ability damage deal bonus true damage to enemy champions after using a dash, leap, blink, teleport, or when leaving stealth.
runes.longDesc:
Damaging basic attacks and ability damage deal a bonus 20 - 80 True Damage based on level to enemy champions after using a dash, leap, blink, teleport, or when leaving stealth for 4s.

Cooldown: 10s

runes.name: Zombie Ward
runes.shortDesc: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>Takedowns</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> on enemy Wards cause friendly Zombie Wards to sprout from their corpses. Gain permanent AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> for each Zombie Ward spawned plus bonus upon completion.
runes.longDesc:
Takedowns on enemy Wards cause friendly Zombie Wards to sprout from their corpses.

Gain an adaptive bonus of 1.2 Attack Damage or 2 Ability Power for every Zombie Ward spawned, up to 10.

After spawning 10 Zombie Wards, additionally gain 10 adaptive force.

Zombie Wards are visible, last for 120s and do not count towards your ward limit.

runes.name: Ghost Poro
runes.shortDesc: When your wards expire, they leave behind a Ghost Poro. The Ghost Poro grants vision until discovered. Gain permanent AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> for each Ghost Poro and when your Ghost Poro spots an enemy champion, plus bonus upon completion.
runes.longDesc:
When your wards expire, they leave behind a Ghost Poro, which grants vision for 90s. Nearby enemy champions scare the Ghost Poro away.

Gain an adaptive bonus of 1.2 Attack Damage or 2 Ability Power for every Ghost Poro spawned and when your Ghost Poro spots an enemy champion up to 10 stacks.

After gaining 10 stacks, additionally gain 10 adaptive force.

runes.name: Eyeball Collection
runes.shortDesc: Collect eyeballs for champion <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>takedowns</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>. Gain permanent AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> for each eyeball plus bonus upon collection completion.
runes.longDesc:
Collect eyeballs for champion takedowns. Gain an adaptive bonus of 1.2 Attack Damage or 2 Ability Power, per eyeball collected.

Upon completing your collection at 10 eyeballs, additionally gain an adaptive bonus of 6 Attack Damage, or 10 Ability Power.

Collect 1 eyeball per champion takedown.

runes.name: Treasure Hunter
runes.shortDesc: Unique takedowns grant additional gold the first time they are collected.
runes.longDesc:
Gain an additional 50 gold the next time you collect a Bounty Hunter stack. Increase the gold gained by 20 gold for each Bounty Hunter stack, up to 130 gold.

Bounty Hunter stacks are earned the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.

runes.name: Relentless Hunter
runes.shortDesc: Unique takedowns grant permanent out of combat MS.
runes.longDesc:
Gain 8 Move Speed out of combat per Bounty Hunter stack.

Bounty Hunter stacks are earned the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.

runes.name: Ultimate Hunter
runes.shortDesc: Unique takedowns grant permanent cooldown reduction on your Ultimate.
runes.longDesc:
Your ultimate gains 6 Ability Haste, plus an additional 5 Ability Haste per Bounty Hunter stack.

Bounty Hunter stacks are earned the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.

runes.name: Glacial Augment
runes.shortDesc: Immobilizing an enemy champion will cause 3 glacial rays that slow nearby enemies and reduce their damage to your allies.
runes.longDesc:
Immobilizing an enemy champion will cause 3 glacial rays to emanate from them towards you and other nearby champions, creating frozen zones for 3 (+ 100% of the immobilizing effect's duration) seconds that slow enemies for 20% (+9% per 10% Heal and Shield Power) (+6% per 100 Ability Power) (+7% per 100 bonus Attack Damage) and reduce their damage by 15% against your allies (not including yourself).

Cooldown: 25s

runes.name: Unsealed Spellbook
runes.shortDesc: Swap Summoner Spells while out of combat. Swapping to unique Summoner Spells will increase the rate at which you can make future swaps.
runes.longDesc:
Swap one of your equipped Summoner Spells to a new, single use Summoner Spell. Each unique Summoner Spell you swap to permanently decreases your swap cooldown by 25s (initial swap cooldown is at 5 mins).

Your first swap becomes available at 6 mins.

Summoner Spells can only be swapped while out of combat.
After using a swapped Summoner Spell you must swap 3 more times before the first can be selected again.
Smite damage increases after two Summoner Spell swaps.

runes.name: First Strike
runes.shortDesc: When you initiate champion combat, deal 8% extra damage for 3 seconds and gain gold based on damage dealt.
runes.longDesc:
Attacks or abilities against an enemy champion within 0.25s of entering champion combat grant 15 gold and First Strike for 3 seconds, causing you to deal 8% extra damage against champions, and granting 50% (35% for ranged champions) of bonus damage dealt as gold.

Cooldown: 25 - 15s

runes.name: Hextech Flashtraption
runes.shortDesc:
While Flash is on cooldown it is replaced by Hexflash.

Hexflash: Channel, then blink to a new location.
runes.longDesc:
While Flash is on cooldown it is replaced by Hexflash.

Hexflash: Channel for 2s to blink to a new location.

Cooldown: 20s. Goes on a 10s cooldown when you enter champion combat.

runes.name: Magical Footwear
runes.shortDesc: You get free boots at 12 min but you cannot buy boots before then. Each <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>takedown</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> you get makes your boots come 45s sooner.
runes.longDesc:
You get free Slightly Magical Footwear at 12 min, but you cannot buy boots before then. For each takedown you acquire the boots 45s sooner.

Slightly Magical Footwear grants you an additional 10 Move Speed.

runes.name: Cash Back
runes.shortDesc: Get some gold back when you purchase Legendary Items.
runes.longDesc: Get 6% Gold back when you purchase Legendary Items.

runes.name: Triple Tonic
runes.shortDesc:
Upon reaching level 3, gain an Elixir of Avarice.
Upon reaching level 6, gain an Elixir of Force.
Upon reaching level 9, gain an Elixir of Skill.
runes.longDesc:
Upon reaching level 3, gain an Elixir of Avarice.
Upon reaching level 6, gain an Elixir of Force.
Upon reaching level 9, gain an Elixir of Skill.

runes.name: Time Warp Tonic
runes.shortDesc: Potions grant some restoration immediately.
runes.longDesc: Consuming a potion grants 40% of its health restoration immediately.

runes.name: Biscuit Delivery
runes.shortDesc: Gain a free Biscuit every 2 min, until 6 min. Consuming or selling a Biscuit permanently increases your max mana and restores health and mana.
runes.longDesc:
Biscuit Delivery: Gain a Total Biscuit of Everlasting Will every 2 mins, until 6 min.

Biscuits restore 8% of your missing health and mana. Consuming or selling a Biscuit permanently increases your mana cap by 40.

Manaless: Champions without mana restore 12% missing health instead.

runes.name: Cosmic Insight
runes.shortDesc:
+18 Summoner Spell Haste
+10 Item Haste
runes.longDesc:
+18 Summoner Spell Haste
+10 Item Haste

runes.name: Approach Velocity
runes.shortDesc: Bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> towards nearby enemy champions that are <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairMov'>movement impaired</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>, increased for enemy champions that you impair.
runes.longDesc:
Gain 7.5% Move Speed towards nearby enemy champions that are movement impaired. This bonus is increased to 15% Move Speed for any enemy champion that you impair.

Activation Range for CC from allies: 1000

runes.name: Jack Of All Trades
runes.shortDesc:
For each different stat gained from items, gain one Jack stack. Each stack grants you 1 Ability Haste.

Gain bonus Adaptive Force at 5 and 10 stacks.
runes.longDesc:
For each different stat gained from items, gain one Jack stack. Each stack grants you 1 Ability Haste.

Gain 10 or 25 bonus Adaptive Force at 5 and 10 stacks, respectively.

runes.name: Press the Attack
runes.shortDesc: Hitting an enemy champion 3 consecutive times deals bonus damage and amplifies your damage until you leave combat with champions.
runes.longDesc: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 consecutive basic attacks deals 40 - 160 bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'><font color='#48C4B7'>adaptive damage</font></lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> (based on level) and amplifies your damage dealt by 8% until you leave combat with champions.

runes.name: Fleet Footwork
runes.shortDesc: Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack heals you and grants increased <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
runes.longDesc:
Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack is Energized

Energized attacks heal you for 8 - 110 (+0.1 Bonus AD, +0.05 AP) and grant 20% Move Speed for 1s.

Healing from minions is 10% effective for Ranged Champions, and 20% effective for Melee Champions.

runes.name: Conqueror
runes.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
runes.longDesc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 5s, gaining 1.8-4 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 8% of the damage you deal to champions (5% for ranged champions).

runes.name: Absorb Life
runes.shortDesc: Killing a target heals you.
runes.longDesc: Killing a target heals you for @HealAmount@.

runes.name: Triumph
runes.shortDesc: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>Takedowns</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> restore 5% of your missing health and grant an additional 20 gold.
runes.longDesc:
Takedowns restore 5% of your missing health, 2.5% of your max health, and grant an additional 20 gold.


'The most dangerous game brings the greatest glory.'
—Noxian Reckoner

runes.name: Presence of Mind
runes.shortDesc: Increase your mana or energy regeneration when damaging an enemy champion. Takedowns restore mana or energy.
runes.longDesc:
Damaging an enemy champion increases your mana regeneration by @RegenAmount@ (80% for ranged) mana per second for 4 seconds. All energy users gain 1.5 energy per second, instead.

Takedowns restore 15% of your maximum mana or energy.

runes.name: Legend: Alacrity
runes.shortDesc: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Attack Speed.
runes.longDesc:
Gain 3% attack speed plus an additional 1.5% for every Legend stack (max 10 stacks).

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.

runes.name: Legend: Haste
runes.shortDesc: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Basic Ability Haste.
runes.longDesc:
Gain 1.5 basic ability haste for every Legend stack (max 10 stacks).

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.

runes.name: Legend: Bloodline
runes.shortDesc: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Life Steal, up to a cap. Once the cap is reached, increase your max health. Weaker earlier but stronger later game than other Legend Runes.
runes.longDesc:
Gain 0.35% Life Steal for every Legend stack (max 15 stacks). At maximum Legend stacks, gain 85 max health.

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.

runes.name: Coup de Grace
runes.shortDesc: Deal more damage to low health enemy champions.
runes.longDesc: Deal 8% more damage to champions who have less than 40% health.

runes.name: Cut Down
runes.shortDesc: Deal more damage to high health enemy champions.
runes.longDesc: Deal 8% more damage to champions who have more than 60% health.

runes.name: Last Stand
runes.shortDesc: Deal more damage to champions while you are low on health.
runes.longDesc: Deal 5% - 11% increased damage to champions while you are below 60% health. Max damage gained at 30% health.

runes.name: Grasp of the Undying
runes.shortDesc: Every 4s your next attack on a champion deals bonus magic damage, heals you, and permanently increases your health.
runes.longDesc:
Every 4s in combat, your next basic attack on a champion will:
  • Deal bonus magic damage equal to 3.5% of your max health
  • Heals you for 3 + 1.2% of your max health
  • Permanently increase your health by 7

    • Ranged Champions: Damage, healing, and permanent health gained reduced by 40%.

runes.name: Aftershock
runes.shortDesc: After <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Immobilize'>immobilizing</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> an enemy champion gain defenses and later deal a burst of magic damage around you.
runes.longDesc:
After immobilizing an enemy champion, increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 35 + 80% of your Bonus Resists for 2.5s. Then explode, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

Damage: 25 - 120 (+8% of your bonus health)
Cooldown: 20s

Resistance bonus from Aftershock capped at: 80-150 (based on level)

runes.name: Guardian
runes.shortDesc: Guard allies you cast spells on and those that are very nearby. If you or a guarded ally would take damage based on level, you're both granted a shield.
runes.longDesc:
Guard allies within 350 units of you, and allies you target with spells for 2.5s. While Guarding, if you or the ally take more than a small amount of damage over the duration of the Guard, both of you gain a shield for 1.5s.

Cooldown: 90 - 40 seconds
Shield: 45 - 120 + 12.5% of your ability power + 8% of your bonus health
Proc Threshold: 90 - 250 postmitigation damage

runes.name: Demolish
runes.shortDesc: Charge up a powerful attack against a tower while near it.
runes.longDesc:
Charge up a powerful attack against a tower over 3s, while within 600 range of it. The charged attack deals 100 (+35% of your max health) bonus physical damage.

Cooldown: 45s

runes.name: Font of Life
runes.shortDesc: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairMov'>Impairing</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> the movement of an enemy champion heals nearby allied champions.
runes.longDesc:
Impairing the movement of an enemy champion restores @BaseHeal@ Health to you and the lowest health nearby allied champion.

70% effect for Ranged Users.

Cooldown: 20s

runes.name: Shield Bash
runes.shortDesc: Whenever you gain a shield, your next basic attack against a champion deals bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'><font color='#48C4B7'>adaptive</font></lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> damage.
runes.longDesc:
While shielded, gain 1 - 10 Armor and Magic Resist based on Level.

Whenever you gain a new shield, your next basic attack against a champion deals 5 - 30 (+1.5% Bonus Health) (+8.5% New Shield Amount) bonus adaptive damage.

You have up to 2s after the shield expires to use this effect.

runes.name: Conditioning
runes.shortDesc: After 12 min gain +8 Armor and +8 Magic Resist and increase your bonus Armor and Magic Resist by 3%.
runes.longDesc: After 12 min gain +8 Armor and +8 Magic Resist and increase your bonus Armor and Magic Resist by 3%.

runes.name: Second Wind
runes.shortDesc: After taking damage from an enemy champion heal back some missing health over time.
runes.longDesc: After taking damage from an enemy champion, heal for 4% of your missing health +3 over 10s.

runes.name: Bone Plating
runes.shortDesc:
After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal 30-60 less damage.


Duration: 1.5s
Cooldown: 55s
runes.longDesc:
After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal 30-60 less damage.


Duration: 1.5s
Cooldown: 55s

runes.name: Overgrowth
runes.shortDesc: Gain permanent max health when minions or monsters die near you.
runes.longDesc:
Absorb life essence from monsters or enemy minions that die near you, permanently gaining 3 maximum health for every 8.

When you've absorbed 120 monsters or enemy minions, gain an additional 3.5% maximum health.

runes.name: Revitalize
runes.shortDesc:
Gain 5% Heal and Shield Power.

Heals and shields you cast or receive are 10% stronger on targets below 40% health.
runes.longDesc:
Gain 5% Heal and Shield Power.

Heals and shields you cast or receive are 10% stronger on targets below 40% health.

runes.name: Unflinching
runes.shortDesc: Gain Armor and Magic Resist when receiving crowd control.
runes.longDesc: Gain 2 - 10 (level scaling) Armor and Magic Resist when crowd controlled and for 2 seconds after.

runes.name: Summon Aery
runes.shortDesc: Your attacks and abilities send Aery to a target, damaging enemies or shielding allies.
runes.longDesc:
Damaging enemy champions with basic attacks or abilities sends Aery to them, dealing 10 - 50 based on level (+0.05 AP) (+0.1 bonus AD).

Empower or protecting allies with abilities sends Aery to them, shielding them for 30 - 100 based on level (+0.05 AP) (+0.1 bonus AD).

Aery cannot be sent out again until she returns to you.

runes.name: Arcane Comet
runes.shortDesc: Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a damaging comet at their location.
runes.longDesc:
Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a comet at their location, or, if Arcane Comet is on cooldown, reduces its remaining cooldown.

Adaptive Damage: 30 - 130 based on level (+0.05 AP and +0.1 bonus AD)
Cooldown: 20 - 8s

Cooldown Reduction:
Single Target: 20%.
Area of Effect: 10%.
Damage over Time: 5%.

runes.name: Phase Rush
runes.shortDesc: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities grants a burst of MS.
runes.longDesc:
Hitting an enemy champion with 3 attacks or separate abilities within 4s grants 15 - 40% Move Speed based on level and 75% Slow Resistance.
This is increased to 25 - 50% Move Speed for Melee champions.
Duration: 3s
Cooldown: 30s - 10s

runes.name: Nullifying Orb
runes.shortDesc: Gain a magic damage shield when taken to low health by magic damage.
runes.longDesc:
When you take magic damage that would reduce your health below 30%, first gain a shield that absorbs 35 to 110 (+14% bonus attack damage) + (9% ability power) magic damage based on level for 4s.

Cooldown: 60s

runes.name: Manaflow Band
runes.shortDesc:
Hitting an enemy champion with an ability permanently increases your maximum mana by 25, up to 250 mana.

After reaching 250 bonus mana, restore 1% of your missing mana every 5 seconds.
runes.longDesc:
Hitting an enemy champion with an ability permanently increases your maximum mana by 25, up to 250 mana.

After reaching 250 bonus mana, restore 1% of your missing mana every 5 seconds.

Cooldown: 15 seconds

runes.name: Nimbus Cloak
runes.shortDesc: After casting a Summoner Spell, gain a short <speed>Move Speed</speed> increase that allows you to pass through units.
runes.longDesc:
After casting a Summoner Spell, gain a Move Speed increase that lasts for 2s and allows you to pass through units.

Increase: 5% - 25% Move Speed based on the Summoner Spell's cooldown. (Higher cooldown Summoner Spells grant more Move Speed).

runes.name: Transcendence
runes.shortDesc:
Gain bonuses upon reaching the following levels:
Level 5: +5 Ability Haste
Level 8: +5 Ability Haste
Level 11: On Champion takedown, reduce the remaining cooldown of basic abilities by 20%.
runes.longDesc:
Gain bonuses upon reaching the following levels:
Level 5: +5 Ability Haste
Level 8: +5 Ability Haste
Level 11: On Champion takedown, reduce the remaining cooldown of basic abilities by 20%.

runes.name: Celerity
runes.shortDesc: All <speed>Move Speed</speed> bonuses are 7% more effective on you and gain <speed>1% Move Speed</speed>.
runes.longDesc: All movement bonuses are 7% more effective on you and gain <speed>1% Move Speed</speed>.

runes.name: Absolute Focus
runes.shortDesc: While above 70% health, gain extra <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
runes.longDesc:
While above 70% health, gain an adaptive bonus of up to 18 Attack Damage or 30 Ability Power (based on level).

Grants 1.8 Attack Damage or 3 Ability Power at level 1.

runes.name: Scorch
runes.shortDesc: Your first damaging ability hit every 10s burns champions.
runes.longDesc:
Your next damaging ability hit sets champions on fire dealing 20 - 40 bonus magic damage based on level after 1s.

Cooldown: 10s

runes.name: Waterwalking
runes.shortDesc: Gain <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and AP or AD, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> in the river.
runes.longDesc:
Gain 10 Move Speed and an adaptive bonus of up to 18 Attack Damage or 30 Ability Power (based on level) when in the river.


May you be as swift as the rushing river and agile as a startled Rift Scuttler.

runes.name: Gathering Storm
runes.shortDesc: Gain increasing amounts of AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> over the course of the game.
runes.longDesc:
Every 10 min gain AP or AD, adaptive.

10 min: + 8 AP or 5 AD
20 min: + 24 AP or 14 AD
30 min: + 48 AP or 29 AD
40 min: + 80 AP or 48 AD
50 min: + 120 AP or 72 AD
60 min: + 168 AP or 101 AD
etc...
